charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) Possession of a Firearm by a Convicted Person

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:922(g)(1) Possession of a Firearm by a Convicte

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 922 (g) (1) Possession of a firearm by a convicted felon May 23, 2006(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of thirty-three (33) months (recommendations to Bureau of Prisons stated more fully in Judgment); Three (3) years' Supervised Release with standard and additional conditions (more fully stated in Judgment); Fine waived; $100.00 Special Assessment, due immediately.
